sentences.en: a strong belief in God
sentences.cn: 笃信上帝

sentences.en: belief in the existence of a benevolent god
sentences.cn: 对于仁慈的神之存在的笃信

sentences.en: Belief in the utility of higher education is shared by students nationwide.
sentences.cn: 全国的学生都相信高等教育是有用的。

sentences.en: Contrary to popular belief, moderate exercise actually decreases your appetite.
sentences.cn: 与通常的看法相反，适度的运动事实上会降低食欲。

sentences.en: He had been questing for religious belief from an early age.
sentences.cn: 他从小就一直在寻求宗教信仰。

sentences.en: He holds the belief that he is a latter-day prophet.
sentences.cn: 他深信自己是当代先知。

sentences.en: he took the property in the belief that he had consent.
sentences.cn: 他拿了那份财产，以为自己得到了同意。

sentences.en: her sincere belief that her brother was not the murderer
sentences.cn: 她真心相信哥哥不是凶手

sentences.en: Her son's skin improved beyond belief.
sentences.cn: 她儿子的皮肤得到了难以置信的改善。

sentences.en: I admire his passionate belief in what he is doing.
sentences.cn: 我佩服他对自己的工作所抱的坚定信心。

sentences.en: religious beliefs
sentences.cn: 宗教信仰

sentences.en: richness beyond belief.
sentences.cn: 难以置信的丰富（或富饶）。

sentences.en: the driving we have witnessed was beyond belief.
sentences.cn: 我们亲眼目睹的驾车场面令人难以置信。

sentences.en: The Greeks accepted belief in the immortality of the soul.
sentences.cn: 希腊人相信灵魂不灭。

sentences.en: The statistics beggar belief.
sentences.cn: 统计数据让人难以置信。

sentences.en: The volunteers were fortified by their patriotic belief.
sentences.cn: 爱国信念更加坚定了志愿者们的信心。

sentences.en: This absolutist belief is replaced by an appreciation that rules can vary.
sentences.cn: 这种绝对主义的信念被规则可以变通这一认识所替代。

sentences.en: We are devastated, shocked beyond belief.
sentences.cn: 我们极为震惊，无法相信所发生的一切。

sentences.en: We have no real, objective, scientific evidence for our belief.
sentences.cn: 我们并无实际、客观、科学的证据支撑我们的信仰。

sentences.en: When you get something wrong, it can shake your belief in yourself.
sentences.cn: 如果有什么事情没做好，就会动摇你对自己的信心。

sentences.en: William has acquired an unshakeable belief in himself.
sentences.cn: 威廉对自己有绝对的信心。

sentences.en: You need an undying belief in your own ability.
sentences.cn: 你要坚定不移地相信自己的能力。

phrases.phrase: to the best of my belief

trans.tran_cn: 信心，信任，信念，信仰，看法，意见
trans.tran_en: the feeling that something is definitely true or definitely exists
